comments.body:
The repo states Apache License: https://github.com/ncbi/datasets/blob/master/pkgs/ncbi-datasets-cli/LICENSE

Can you fix that? Please also use SPDX identifiers: https://spdx.org/licenses/
That was the incorrect licence file.  I've merged release/11.25.1 into the master branch, and I don't see  an appropriate SPDX identifier for the Public Domain licence.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +27,31 @@about:
  home: https://github.com/ncbi/datasets/tree/master/pkgs/ncbi-datasets-cli
  license: Public Domain
  license_file: pkgs/ncbi-datasets-cli/LICENSE.md
  summary: 'NCBI Datasets command-line clients'
